hero.heading: Empowering You with Knowledge of Your Rights
hero.description: At our startup, we are dedicated to providing you with essential information about your rights in various situations. Discover how our innovative AI app can guide you through your specific case and ensure you receive the support you deserve.

termsAndConditions.text: By signing up, you agree to our

features.heading: Discover Your Rights with Our Innovative AI App
features.description: Our cutting-edge AI app simplifies the process of understanding your rights across various situations. With just a few taps, you can access tailored information that ensures you know exactly what you're entitled to.

featuresList.heading: Unlock the Benefits of Our AI App
featuresList.description: Our AI app simplifies the process of understanding your rights. With just a few taps, you can access crucial information tailored to your specific case.

features.title: Effortless Access to Essential Information
features.description: Get instant access to vital information at your fingertips.

features.title: Tailored Analysis for Your Unique Situation
features.description: Our app provides personalized insights based on your circumstances.

features.title: Stay Informed with Current Data
features.description: Access reliable and up-to-date information whenever you need it.

faqSection.heading: FAQs
faqSection.description: Find answers to common questions about our services and AI app.

questions.title: What is your service?
questions.answer: We provide information on rights related to various cases. Our AI app simplifies this process by delivering tailored insights. Whether it's a car accident or another issue, we guide you through your rights.

questions.title: Can I get support?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We offer support through our customer service team. You can reach out via the app or our website for assistance at any time.

questions.title: How does the app work?
questions.answer: Our app collects relevant information about your case. It analyses the data to inform you of your rights. This ensures you have the knowledge needed to make informed decisions.

questions.title: What if I have more questions?
questions.answer: If you have additional questions, don’t hesitate to contact us. We are here to provide clarity and support. Your understanding is our priority.

questions.title: Is the service free?
questions.answer: Yes, our initial consultation and access to the AI app are free. We believe in empowering individuals with knowledge without financial barriers. Additional services may incur charges, which will be clearly communicated.

questions.title: Is my data secure?
questions.answer: Yes, we take data security very seriously. Your information is protected with industry-standard encryption and privacy measures. We do not share your data without your consent.

questions.title: Who can use it?
questions.answer: Our services are designed for anyone seeking information about their rights. Whether you're involved in a car accident or facing other legal issues, we are here to help. Our app is user-friendly and accessible to all.

questions.title: How often is information updated?
questions.answer: Our app regularly updates its information to ensure accuracy. We monitor legal changes and adjust our content accordingly. This guarantees you receive the most current advice.

questions.title: How do I start?
questions.answer: Getting started is simple! Download our app and create an account to begin. Follow the prompts to enter your case details and discover your rights.

questions.title: Can I provide feedback?
questions.answer: We welcome your feedback! It helps us improve our services and app functionality. You can submit your thoughts through the app or our website.

faqSection.footerDescription: Reach out to us anytime for assistance.

benefits.heading: Discover the transformative benefits of our AI-powered rights information app.
benefits.description: Our AI app streamlines the process of understanding your rights, saving you valuable time. With precise information at your fingertips, you can navigate your case with confidence.

subHeadings.title: Time-Saving
subHeadings.description: Get instant access to essential information without the hassle of extensive research.

subHeadings.title: Accurate Insights
subHeadings.description: Rely on our AI for accurate, up-to-date information tailored to your specific situation.

ctaSection.heading: Empower Yourself with Our App
ctaSection.description: Discover your rights and benefits effortlessly. Try our app for instant access to vital information.

testimonialSection.heading: Customer Testimonials
testimonialSection.description: This app transformed my understanding of my rights.

testimonials.quote: "With the AI app, I felt empowered and informed."

testimonials.quote: "I never knew I had so many options available!"
testimonials.name: Juuso Montonen

cookieConsent.message: We use cookies to improve the website, analyze usage, and assist with marketing.
cookieConsent.cookieSettingsDescription: Customize your cookie settings. Essential cookies are always enabled to ensure the website functions properly.

cookiePolicy.title: Cookie Policy
cookiePolicy.introduction: , we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring transparency about the data we collect through cookies. This Cookie Policy explains how and why we use cookies, the types of cookies we use, and your choices regarding cookie management.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.description: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They are widely used to make websites work efficiently, enhance your user experience, and provide analytical data to website owners. Cookies can store information such as your preferences, login status, and browsing activities.

typesOfCookies.title: Types of Cookies We Use
typesOfCookies.necessary: Necessary Cookies: These cookies are essential for the website to function properly. They enable core functionalities such as security, authentication, and accessibility.
typesOfCookies.performance: Performance Cookies: These cookies help us analyze website performance and improve your experience by collecting anonymized data about how users interact with the site.
typesOfCookies.functional: Functional Cookies: These cookies allow us to remember your preferences, such as language selection and other customizable features, to provide a more personalized experience.
typesOfCookies.advertising: Advertising Cookies: These cookies track your online activity to provide you with relevant advertisements based on your interests.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
list: Ensure the proper functioning of our website.
Improve website performance and user experience.
Analyze user behavior and website traffic to optimize content.

managingCookies.title: Managing Cookies
managingCookies.description: You have the right to manage or disable cookies as per your preferences. Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of the website.
managingCookies.learnMore: To learn more about managing cookies, visit the help section of your browser:

changesToPolicy.title: Changes to This Policy
changesToPolicy.description: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or for other operational, legal, or regulatory reasons. Please review this policy periodically to stay informed about our use of cookies.

contactUs.title: Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions or concerns about this Cookie Policy, please contact us at:

terms_modal.title: Terms and Conditions
terms_modal.welcome: Welcome to {companyName}! These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of our website.
terms_modal.definitions_content: “Company” refers to {companyName}, its employees, agents, and affiliates. “User” refers to any person accessing our website or using our services.

services_content.item1: Users must be at least 18 years old or have parental consent to use our services.
services_content.item2: Users agree not to use the website in any way that may damage or impair its functionality.
services_content.item3: Users agree not to use our services for illegal activities.

terms_modal.intellectual_property_content: All content on this website, including text, images, and software, is owned by {companyName} or its licensors. Users are prohibited from reproducing or redistributing any content without prior written permission.
terms_modal.privacy_policy_content: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Please review our Privacy Policy.
terms_modal.limitation_liability_content: {companyName} is not liable for any direct, indirect, or consequential damages arising from the use of our website.
terms_modal.governing_law_content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of {countryName}.
terms_modal.changes_terms_content: We may update these terms from time to time. Users are encouraged to review them regularly.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: At {companyName}, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the safety of your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our services.

informationWeCollect.title: 1. Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.content: We may collect the following types of information:
list: Personal Information: Information you provide when creating an account or contacting us, such as your name, email address, and phone number.
Usage Data: Data about how you use our website and services, including IP address, browser type, and interactions.
Machine Learning Insights: Information generated by our AI models based on your inputs, limited to publicly available data.

howWeUseYourInformation.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
list: To provide, improve, and personalize our AI services.
To communicate updates, new features, or support-related matters.
To ensure security and detect fraudulent or unauthorized activity.

dataSecurity.title: 3. Data Security
dataSecurity.content: Your data's security is our priority. We use industry-standard encryption and secure storage solutions to protect your information from unauthorized access, alteration, or disclosure.
dataSecurity.note: However, please note that no online platform can guarantee 100% security. We continuously strive to improve our security practices.

useOfAI.title: 4. Use of AI and Machine Learning
useOfAI.content: Our services rely on AI and machine learning models to provide information and insights. While we strive for accuracy, {companyName} cannot guarantee that all AI-generated responses will be free from errors or inaccuracies.
useOfAI.note: We primarily use publicly available information to train our models and generate outputs.

sharingInformation.title: 5. Sharing of Information
sharingInformation.content: We do not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties. However, we may share data with trusted partners for the purposes of providing or improving our services, with strict adherence to confidentiality agreements.

yourRights.title: 6. Your Rights
yourRights.content: You have the right to access, modify, or delete your personal information at any time. If you have any concerns about how we handle your data, please contact us at privacy@{companyWebsite}.

changesToPolicy.title: 7. Changes to this Policy
changesToPolicy.content: We may update this Privacy Policy periodically to reflect changes in our practices or regulatory requirements. Users are encouraged to review this policy regularly.

contactUs.title: 8. Contact Us
contactUs.content: If you have any questions or concerns regarding our Privacy Policy, feel free to reach out to us at privacy@{companyWebsite}.
